option.wildtoolaccess.last_swapped_out_f: tool that got swapped out last time will be in first slot
option.wildtoolaccess.put_to_the_right_i: item to get swapped out will go in slot to the right, if it's empty
tooltip.wildtoolaccess.toggle_mode: You don't need to hold down the key to keep the access bar open.
tooltip.wildtoolaccess.left_click_select: Left clicking selects the current item.
tooltip.wildtoolaccess.scroll_with_numbe: select items in bars with number keys
tooltip.wildtoolaccess.select_sound_1: see config file for further info
tooltip.wildtoolaccess.select_sound_2: see config file for further info
tooltip.wildtoolaccess.bar_texture_1: see config file for further info
tooltip.wildtoolaccess.bar_texture_2: see config file for further info
tooltip.wildtoolaccess.leading_empty_slo: The first slot of every bar is empty.
tooltip.wildtoolaccess.held_item_selecte: When opening a bar your currently held item is selected.
tooltip.wildtoolaccess.item_info_shown: see config file for further info
tooltip.wildtoolaccess.last_swapped_out_: see config file for further info
tooltip.wildtoolaccess.put_to_the_right_: see config file for further info
tooltip.wildtoolaccess.lock_swapping_to_: Locks swapping to that hotbar slot. 0 to disable.
tooltip.wildtoolaccess.hotbar_slot_after: Slot get auto selected after swap. 0 to disable.
tooltip.wildtoolaccess.type_to_access_1: see config file for further info
tooltip.wildtoolaccess.type_to_access_2: see config file for further info
option_val.wildtoolaccess.name: name
command.wildtoolaccess.stuff.file_not_fo: %s file could not be found, even though it should.
command.wildtoolaccess.stuff.probably_co: An error occurred. Probably %s.json couldn't be read as a .json file
